title: All 32 - Carolina Panthers: Previewing the beginning of the Matt Rhule era with Joe Person (Football 6/21)
description:
The Panthers went through extreme changes this offseason, so Joe Person of The Athletic joins Ryan Wilson to break them all down on the latest episode of 'All 32'. Well first, since both guys are William & Mary grads, they discuss their college team AND then hit on Carolina. What kind of situation is new coach Matt Rhule inheriting (5:30)? What do we need to know about coaching phenom and new offensive coordinator, Joe Brady (7:00)? Christian McCaffrey's role in the offense (10:00), defensive turnover (11:45) and position battles (14:45) are also discussed. Lastly, Joe and Ryan dive into what would determine a successful season for the Panthers in 2020 (17:00) and why the team must be patient.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsonCBS, @josephperson
